Key:
(Now, then... It's good that I invited Tohka out
on a date tomorrow, but will she really
go with me...?)
Translation:
(A ver... Está bien que haya invitado a
Tohka a una cita mañana, pero
¿de verdad irá conmigo...?)

Key:
(Well... It's not like I have
any particular plans.)
Translation:
(Bueno... No es que tenga
ningún plan en particular)

Key:
(No... If I try thinking too hard, I'll just mess
up again. So I just have to throw my feelings
at her, and let them shatter if they will.)
Translation:
(No... Si intento pensar demasiado, volveré a meter la
pata. Así que sólo tengo que lanzarle mis sentimientos,
y dejar que se hagan añicos si quieren).

Key: Now, and from here on out―
Translation: Ahora, y de aquí en adelante-

Key: Sh-Shido...?
T-Tohka?! Why are you here...?
I... heard from Rinne...
F-From Rinne...?
Yes...

(...Had I told Rinne that I was going here?
W-Well, whatever... That's not important
right now...)
Translation:
(...¿Le había dicho a Rinne que iba aquí?
B-bueno, da igual... Eso no es
importante ahora...)

Key: Hey, Shido...?
Hm! Wh-What is it...?
How do you... feel about Rinne, Shido?
Huh? H-How...? Well...
Just a childhood friend.
Translation: Sólo un amigo de la infancia.

Key: Someone I'm interested in.
She's just a childhood friend, of course.
Translation: Es sólo una amiga de la infancia, por supuesto.

Key: Hm...? Rinne is... your ideal wife, is she not?
Huh...?
Y-You know, that thing... m-marriage!
M-Marriage?!

Marriage is when two people who love each other
promise to be together forever, yes? So, Sh-Shido,
you... you said Rinne was an ideal wife, right?
Translation:
El matrimonio es cuando dos personas que se aman
prometen estar juntas para siempre, ¿no? Sh-Shido,
tú dijiste que Rinne era una esposa ideal, ¿verdad?

Key: Th-That's... Well, you see...!
I knew it...
No! That's not it! Don't misunderstand me!
Hmm...?
I-It's true that Rinne would make a good wife...
Translation: Es verdad que Rinne sería una buena esposa...

Key: Ngh! See, I knew it!
P-Please, just hear me out!
Hm...

But right now, I don't think of Rinne in that
way... And I'm not planning on marrying her.
Translation:
Pero ahora mismo, no pienso en Rinne de esa manera…
Y no estoy planeando casarme con ella.

Key: I-Is that true...?

Yeah...
And right now, the one thing I'm sure of...
Translation:
Sí...  Y ahora mismo, de lo único
que estoy seguro...

Key: Right now... I want to be with you, Tohka!

So, Tohka... Please keep your promise
for tomorrow. Or... will you not?
Translation:
Así que, Tohka... Por favor, mantén tu
promesa para mañana. O... ¿no lo harás?

Key: I-I can, absolutely...!

Really?! Then, it's all right?
Haha, I'm looking forward to it.
Translation:
¿En serio? Entonces, ¿está bien?
Jaja, lo estoy deseando.

Key:
Yes, then, tomorrow... I'm...
looking forward to it as well.
Translation:
Sí, entonces, mañana... Estoy…
deseando que llegue también.

Key: Y-Yeah. I-I'll see you tomorrow!
(Whew... I feel like my feelings got through.)
Translation: (Uf... Siento que logré transmitir mis sentimientos.)

Key:
(There really are times when you just have to face
a person with your true feelings.)
Translation:
(Realmente hay veces en las que simplemente
tienes que enfrentarte a una persona con tus
verdaderos sentimientos).

Key:
(Well, my head's cooled off, I guess I'll go home
and get ready for tomorrow...)
Translation:
(Bueno, se me ha enfriado la cabeza, supongo que
me iré a casa a prepararme para mañana...)

Key:
To be honest... I'd be lying if I said I wasn't
interested, but...
Translation:
Para ser honesto... Mentiría si dijera
que no estoy interesado, pero...

Key: I knew it...
Hmm...? Tohka?

So, I really... have no place...
in your future, Shido...?
Translation:
Entonces, ¿realmente... no tengo lugar…
en tu futuro, Shido...?

Key: Huh, er, no... I, um―!
*Sniffle*! *Sob*...!
H-Hey! Tohka?! Are you okay?!
I... don't... want...! To not... be with Shido...!
Translation: No quiero... ¡No quiero dejar de estar con Shido...!

Key:
Wha―! Tohka! This is bad! At this rate...!
Please calm down!
Translation:
¡Que-! ¡Tohka! ¡Esto es malo! ¡A este paso...!
¡Por favor, cálmate!

Key: UWAAAAAAAH!!!!
A-Aaagh! UWAAAAAHHH...?!
(All right, tomorrow's my date with Tohka...)
Translation: (Muy bien, mañana es mi cita con Tohka...)

Key:
(I don't know if there's anything I can do...
But I want her to go back to her normal self.)
Translation:
(No sé si puedo hacer algo...  Pero quiero
que vuelva a ser la de siempre).

Key:
(I'll try not to think too hard about things, and
just face her with the feelings I have as I go.)
Translation:
(Intentaré no pensar demasiado las cosas, y
simplemente enfrentarme a ella con los
sentimientos que tengo sobre la marcha).

Key: Yes? Come in...
R-Rinne? What's wrong, all of a sudden?
There was something I wanted to ask you, Shido.
Translation: Había algo que quería preguntarte, Shido.

Key: Something you wanted to ask me?

Yes, I wanted to ask you.
Shido... You've decided, haven't you?
Translation:
Sí, quería preguntarte.  Shido…
Te has decidido, ¿verdad?

Key: Er, ah... Yeah...
What are you talking about?
You decided that... You want to save Tohka.
Translation: Decidiste que... Quieres salvar a Tohka.

Key:
Oh... Yeah. I can't watch Tohka be like this,
and I can't leave her alone. Not only that,
but Tohka was trying her best for me―
Translation:
Oh... Sí. No puedo ver a Tohka así, y no puedo
dejarla sola. No sólo eso, sino que Tohka
estaba haciendo todo lo posible por mí-

Key:
You want to be by Tohka's side...
That's what I'm thinking.
Translation:
Quieres estar al lado de Tohka…
Eso es lo que estoy pensando.

Key: I see. So that's your answer, Shido.
Translation: Ya veo. Así que esa es tu respuesta, Shido.

Key: Yeah. That's what I've decided.
Translation: Sí. Eso es lo que he decidido.

Key: Hey, Shido... Can you promise me something?
Promise...? What...?

Promise that from now on, you'll cherish
Tohka-chan. No matter what happens,
you won't let her go... Promise me.
Translation:
Prométeme que a partir de ahora, cuidarás a
Tohka-chan. Pase lo que pase, no la
dejarás marchar... Prométemelo.

Key:
Wh-What are you talking about?
You don't have to ask me to do that...
Translation:
¿De qué estás hablando?
No tienes que pedirme que haga eso...

Key:
Please, I want you to promise me. That you'll only
think of Tohka-chan... Otherwise, I'm sure that
your heart will one day distance itself from her.
Translation:
Por favor, quiero que me prometas. Que sólo pensarás
en Tohka-chan... De lo contrario, estoy seguro de
que tu corazón algún día se distanciará de ella.

Key: Rinne...
Please...

I understand... I promise.
As a man, I won't take back what I've said.
I'll... cherish Tohka, absolutely.
Translation:
Entiendo... Lo prometo. 
Como hombre, no retiraré lo que he dicho.
Voy a... cuidar de Tohka, absolutamente.

Key: Yeah... I knew you would promise me, Shido.
Translation: Sí... Sabía que me lo prometerías, Shido.

Key: Haha, what do you mean by that?

I believe in you, Shido...
Don't forget your promise... Don't ever break it.
Translation:
Creo en ti, Shido…
No olvides tu promesa... Nunca la rompas.

Key: Yeah, of course.
If you break it, you won't get off easy, okay?
Translation: Si lo rompes, no te librarás fácilmente, ¿vale?

Key: I-I know!
I see... Then it's good.
Wh-What is it? Why do you have to threaten me?
Hehe... Sorry.
But...

You'll be fine.
If it's you, you'll be fine... I'm sure of it.
Translation:
Estarás bien.  Si eres tú, estarás bien…
Estoy seguro de ello.

Key: Wh-What was that just now?!
Hey, Rinne... Did you just see―

Huh? Rinne's gone?
When did she...?

Well, it is pretty late...
I should head to bed as well.
Translation:
Bueno, es bastante tarde…
Yo también debería irme a la cama.

Key:
...In this dream... no one can become happy...
Shido Itsuka... I hope your next dream will be
a happy one...
Translation:
...En este sueño... nadie puede llegar a ser feliz…
Shido Itsuka... Espero que tu próximo
sueño sea feliz...
